00004 std::ostream& DhcReadoutConfBlock::print(std::ostream &ostrm){
00005      ostrm << " DhcReadoutConfBlock: "  << std::endl;
00006      ostrm << " Numbers: " << getNumbers() << std::endl; 
00007      ostrm << " Crate number: " << getCrateNumber() << std::endl; 
00008      ostrm << " Number of slots: " << getNumberOfSlots() << std::endl; 
00009      ostrm << " Slot enable mask: " << std::hex << getSlotEnableMask() << std::dec << std::endl; 
00010      ostrm << " Slot enable: " << std::hex << getSlotEnable() << std::dec << std::endl; 
00011      for(unsigned int islot=0; islot < getNumberOfSlots(); islot++) { 
00012          std::cout << " Slot number: " << islot << std::endl; 
00013          std::cout << " Enabled fes: " << getSlotFeEnable(islot) << std::endl; 
00014          std::cout << " Fe revision: " << static_cast<unsigned int>(getSlotFeRevision(islot)) << std::endl; 
00015      }
00016      ostrm << " Be wait interval [mus]: " <<  (getBeWaitInterval().timeStamp())/1000 << std::endl; 
00017      return ostrm;
00018 }

00020 
00021 void DhcReadoutConfBlock::fillSlotToWordsAssociationMask(const unsigned int slotenablemask, bool initvals) {
00023   _islotfillMap.clear();
00024   unsigned int iword(0);
00025   if(_numSlotsInitialised) {
00026     for (unsigned int islot=0; islot < getNumberOfSlots(); islot++) {
00027       if( (0x1 << islot) &  slotenablemask){
00028         _islotfillMap[islot]=iword;     
00029         iword++;
00030       }
00031     }
00032     if(initvals) {
00033       for (unsigned int ipos=0; ipos < iword/2+1; ipos++) obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRoConfIntValues+ipos,0);
00034       unsigned int offset(_islotfillMap.size()/2+_islotfillMap.size()%2);
00035       for (unsigned int ipos=0; ipos < iword/4+1; ipos++) obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRoConfIntValues+offset+ipos,0);
00036     }
00037   } else std::cout <<   "Warning number of slots not initialised please, class not correctly filled" << std::endl;
00038 }

00040 void DhcReadoutConfBlock::fillMethod(unsigned int islot, unsigned int val, unsigned int offset, unsigned int bitalign) {
00041 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00042   std::cout << "offset " << offset << std::endl;  
00043   std::cout << "bitalign " << bitalign<< std::endl;  
00044   std::cout << "val " << std::hex << val << std::dec << std::endl;  
00045 #endif
00046   //if(islot < static_cast<unsigned int>(getIntVal(kDhcRoConfIntNumSlots))) obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRoConfIntValues+offset+(_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)/bitalign, getIntVal(kDhcRoConfIntValues+offset+(_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)/bitalign) | (val << ((_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)%bitalign)*(32/bitalign)));
00047 if( (0x1 << islot) & getSlotEnableMask() ) { obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRoConfIntValues+offset+(_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)/bitalign, getIntVal(kDhcRoConfIntValues+offset+(_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)/bitalign) | (val << ((_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)%bitalign)*(32/bitalign)));
00048 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00049   std::cout << "Shift val: " <<  ((_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)%bitalign)*(32/bitalign) << std::endl;
00050   std::cout << "Word val: " <<  (_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)/bitalign << std::endl;
00051   std::cout << "Cur val: " << getIntVal(kDhcRoConfIntValues+offset+(_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)/bitalign) << std::endl;
00052 #endif
00053   } else std::cout << "DhcReadoutConfBlock Warning - Trying to access disabled or non-existing slot! Slot enable mask " << std::hex << getSlotEnableMask() << " got " << std::dec << islot << std::endl;  
00054 
00055 }

00057 unsigned short DhcReadoutConfBlock::getMethod(unsigned int islot, unsigned int offset, unsigned int bitalign) {
00058 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00059   std::cout << "offset " << offset << std::endl;  
00060   std::cout << "bitalign " << bitalign<< std::endl;  
00061 #endif
00062     unsigned short feenable(0);
00063     if( (0x1 << islot) & getSlotEnableMask() ) { feenable = static_cast<unsigned short>(((getIntVal(kDhcRoConfIntValues+offset+(_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)/bitalign)) >> ((_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)%bitalign)*(32/bitalign)) & 0xffff); 
00064 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00065     std::cout << "Read val " << std::hex << getIntVal(kDhcRoConfIntValues+offset+(_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)/bitalign) << std::dec << std::endl;      
00066     std::cout << "Word val: " <<  (_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)/bitalign << std::endl;
00067     std::cout << "Shift val " << ((_islotfillMap.find(islot)->second)%bitalign)*(32/bitalign) << std::endl;
00068 #endif
00069     }
00070     else std::cout << "DhcReadoutConfBlock Warning - Trying to access disabled or non-existing slot! Slot enable mask " << std::hex << getSlotEnableMask() << " got " << std::dec << islot << std::endl;  
00071 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00072     std::cout << "retval " << std::hex << feenable << std::dec << std::endl;  
00073 #endif
00074     return feenable;
00075 
00076 }
